channel.title: CVE Feed for sjwall -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sjwall -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-36036|2024-08-03T09:52:00.316Z -- sjwall -- mdx-mermaid
item.description: mdx-mermaid provides plug and play access to Mermaid in MDX. There is a potential for an arbitrary javascript injection in versions less than 1.3.0 and 2.0.0-rc1. Modify any mermaid code blocks with arbitrary code and it will execute when the component is loaded by MDXjs. This vulnerability was patched in version(s) 1.3.0 and 2.0.0-rc2. There are currently no known workarounds.
